subject: firmware
description_text:
i have a set of simsonn pro pedals and i am unable to use them as i can not
find the firmware update i need. i have downloaded every simsonn software
and none of them can help. furthermore, the links provided for pedals
software on the simsonn website all say 404 not found

conversations.body_text: Hi nathan armijo,  Could you please provide your order number and the version of your pedal? Is it 1.7.0 or 1.7.1?Â
